title: Studio Ghibli English Collection
description:
This is my first upload, but I've been downloading torrents for a couple years now, so hopefully I don't do too much wrong. But way back, I was trying to get all the Studio Ghibli movies in English in one single torrent and it was much harder than it should have been, so I downloaded all of them and compiled them into this one convenient torrent. *This torrent includes all of the films except the two most recently released*

0. NausicaÃƒÂ¤ of the Valley of the Wind
1. Castle in the Sky
2. Grave of the Fireflies
3. My Neighbor Totoro
4. Kiki's Delivery Service
5. Only Yesterday (Note: this is the only one not in English, due to the fact that it was never dubbed)
6. Porco Rosso
7. Pom Poko
8. Whisper of the Heart
9. Princess Mononoke
10. My Neighbors the Yamadas
11. Spirited Away
12. The Cat Returns
13. Howl's Moving Castle
14. Tales from Earthsea
15. Ponyo
16. Arriety
17. From Up on Poppy Hill

I do apologize that they are of varying file types, but as long as you use VLC that shouldn't be a problem.
